name: electricitymaps-mobile
description: A real-time visualisation of the CO2 emissions of electricity consumption

scripts.prepare-mobile: pnpm exec cap copy && pnpm exec cap sync
scripts.dev-ios: NODE_ENV=dev pnpm exec cap run ios
scripts.dev-android: NODE_ENV=dev pnpm exec cap run android
scripts.preview-ios: pnpm prepare-mobile && pnpm exec cap open ios
scripts.preview-android: pnpm prepare-mobile && pnpm exec cap open android
